snippet: The Kosovo police on Monday arrested at least 40 people in a major operation to round up suspects accused of fighting alongside extremists in Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Kosovo police arrest at least 40 people in major operation to round up suspects accused of fighting alongside extremists in Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: The Kosovo police on Monday arrested at least 40 people in a major operation to round up suspects accused of fighting alongside extremists in Iraq and Syria.

headline.main: Kosovo: Suspects Rounded Up in Hunt for Mideast Fighters
headline.print_headline: Kosovo: Suspects Rounded Up in Hunt for Mideast Fighters
